title: * SCRAP * 1919 T213-3 Marquard MISSING Caption and Jersey Logo ** SOLD!! **
author: shammus

posts.post_title: * SCRAP * 1919 T213-3 Marquard MISSING Caption and Jersey Logo ** SOLD!! **
posts.post_content:
Awesome, very rare printing goof tied to the t213-3 set.  I've seen a lot of cards missing color passes.  Very rarely do I see them missing captions like this.  In addition to the missing caption, this card is also missing the "NY" logo on Rube's left shoulder.  Awesome oddity that has a real "scrap" feel to it as the entire card really looks "off".  

The third image shown below is what this card SHOULD look like.  

Asking $1600 delivered or would consider trades for e107s or n300s.  Thanks all!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
